Patch fix

Fix the SelectConnectorEditPartTracker to return only the connection edit part
not the viewer selection set.

- When multiply selecting connectors and attempting to create new bendpoints 
on one of the connections, all of the selected connections are responding with 
feedback.  This can cause an IndexOfOutBounds exception because the parameters 
for creating bendpoints on one connections won't be compatible with another 
with less bendpoints.  The fix is to modify the operation set of the drag 
tracker to only include the single connection being modified.
